name: Monster Girl Dreams
summary: Monster Girl Dreams is an adult role-playing game made by Threshold where you, a recent male graduate from adventuring school, travel to the home continent of monster girls, Lucidia, so that you can prove your worth as an adventurer! The catch? Physical violence of any kind is prohibited for the entire continent, and the only way to combat your foes is to get very "physical" with them. Adventure, loot, and seduce your way through a plethora of fantasy-oriented locations in an attempt to free yourself of your collected debt, or get fucked into submission while trying. Also defeat the Demon Queen. Maybe.
